name: Perudo
description:
Perudo is a fun dice game originating in South America and now on your mobile or tablet device!
Roll, bluff, and bet your way to the top!

Play against the bots or with up to 4 people on the same device!

Ability to remove ads and purchase new dice!
A new Advanced option to change the following:
- New Calza (Spot-On, Jonti) function!
- Enable or disable the Palifico Round!
- Enable or disable Aces as wilds!
